manifestVersion.description: The version of the manifest schema this manifest is using.

id.description: A unique identifier for this extension. The id must use reverse domain name notation.

version.description: The extension version. Changes to the extension should cause a version change. This version string must follow the semver standard.

name.description: The display name of the extension.
The display name for the developer

websiteUrl.description: The url to the developer's website.

privacyUrl.description: The url to the developer's privacy policy.

termsOfUseUrl.description: The url to the developer's terms of use.

short.description: A short description of the extension used when space is limited.

full.description: The full description of the extension.

44.description: An icon for the extension sized to 44x44.

88.description: An icon for the extension sized to 88x88.

accentColor.description: A color to use in conjunction with the extension's icons.

configUrl.description: The url to use when configuring the extension.

canUpdateConfig.description: A value indicating whether an instance of the extension's config can be updated by the user after creation.

needsIdentity.description: A value indicating whether the extension is requesting access to identity information

validDomains.description: A list of valid domains from which the extension expects to load any content.
